# CKSharingParticipantAccessOption

**Structure**

An object that controls participant access options.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CKSharingParticipantAccessOption
```

## Creating an access option

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates and initializes a participant access option object.

## Configuring the options

- **any**: The permission option the system uses to control whether a user can share publicly or privately.
- **anyoneWithLink**: The permission option the system uses to control whether a user can share publicly.
- **specifiedRecipientsOnly**: The permission option the system uses to control whether a user can share privately.

## Configuring the options

- **allowedParticipantAccessOptions**: The permission option the system uses to control whether a user can share publicly or privately.
- **allowedParticipantPermissionOptions**: The permission option the system uses to control whether a user can grant read-only or write access.
- **CKSharingParticipantPermissionOption**: An object that controls participant permission options.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
